div.p: Let's begin by saying how much we miss all of our students and families! When we left for Spring Break, we did not expect to be away from you all for this long. On very short notice, our administrators and teachers jumped into action to make a workable plan and a pathway for our students to continue learning. Parents & guardians, we look to you now to commit yourselves to help prepare your child for success.
